mapper.select: SELECT A.LANGUAGE_TEST_ID , A.LANGUAGE_TEST_NAME , A.QUALIFICATION_NUMBER , A.ISSUER , DATE(A.QUALIFIED_AT) AS QUALIFIED_AT , A.GRADE_SCORE , A.EMPLOYEE_ID , B.LANGUAGE_NAME FROM LANGUAGE_TEST A INNER JOIN LANGUAGE B ON A.LANGUAGE_CODE = B.LANGUAGE_CODE

SELECT A.LANGUAGE_TEST_ID , A.LANGUAGE_TEST_NAME , A.QUALIFICATION_NUMBER , A.ISSUER , DATE(A.QUALIFIED_AT) AS QUALIFIED_AT , A.GRADE_SCORE , A.EMPLOYEE_ID , B.LANGUAGE_NAME FROM LANGUAGE_TEST A INNER JOIN LANGUAGE B ON A.LANGUAGE_CODE = B.LANGUAGE_CODE WHERE A.EMPLOYEE_ID = #{employeeId}
